bio: Sally is tactful, gloomy and fierce. Which isn't out of the ordinary for someone with her troubled past. She was born and grew up in a needy family in a normal port, she lived comfortably until she was about 4 years old, but at that point things took a turn for the worst. She lost her sisters in a fight which got out of control and was headed for a life of misery. While persued by the authority she had to survive in a brutal world. But with her bravery and inginuity, she managed to crush all that's in the way and find a new home. This has turned her into the woman she is today. Having finally found some peace of mind, she now works on making it in a large tournament. By doing so, she hopes to live a normal life and finally find pleasureful life she has never had.
